title: Watermelon and tomato chutney
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons oil', '1 red onion, minced', '1 red pepper, minced', '1 clove garlic, thinly sliced', '1 teaspoon minced fresh ginger, or to taste', '900g watermelon, coarsely chopped', '450g tomatoes, coarsely chopped', '1 tablespoon lime juice, or to taste', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 pinch salt, or to taste', '1 pinch granulated sugar, or to taste']
